channel.title: Is it possiblt to make owner yellow on map?
channel.description: title says it all..Is it possiblt to make owner yellow on map? Can i make myself seen as yellow for other people on the map?if so, please let me know, i plan on turning into npc, and i want there to be no way to see that im player other than cliking on me, and if i can make it say the name of the npc i turned into when they click on me, thet would be even better, please help
